content: Hi everyone! One existential thought came to me recently:How can my family/friends receive crypto assets in the event of my death or other circumstances in which I will not be able to manage my crypto wallet?And the answer was born along with a new project that we are now launching.Welcome dWill!dWill is the first fully decentralized protocol that allows you to bequeath cryptocurrencies.Project site: dWill.appWith dWill you can:* Bequeath ERC-20 tokens (done)* Bequeath NFT (in development)* Bequeath encrypted NFT messages (for example, you can securely bequeath a seed phrase from a bitcoin wallet to an heir. In development)How dWill works:* dWILL offers to connect the user's wallet and specify the address to which the cryptocurrency will be transferred in case the user's wallet is inactive* The user himself determines the duration of inactivity of his wallet, after which dWill will take effect.* The dWILL system monitors wallet activity. If there are no transactions, dWill offers to conduct a free transaction, which will confirm the activity of the wallet. If the wallet is still inactive and the specified date falls, dWill sends funds to the bequeathed wallet.Why is dWill reliable?* Decentralized:dWill works through smart contracts.* Transparent:dWill's algorithms are fully open to external audit at any time. The 100% transparent protocol allows you to bequeath cryptocurrencies with an unprecedented level of reliability.* Gives you full control over your assets:The user's funds remain on his wallet under his full control. dWill is technically unable to receive these funds.Additionally: dWill also plans to partner with international charitable organizations and offer users to give a percentage of the will to those in need.Current status:A. We launched the first version of the project at dWill.app.Q. At the moment, we are undergoing a technical audit of a reputable company, which will confirm the transparency of the service.By the way, after the audit is completed, we will launch a bounty program for developers to find errors in the protocol, so it will help our project and will give an opportunity for developers to earn some money.Future plans:A. Attract the 1st round of investments needed to expand and popularize the projectC. Invite authoritative De-Fi projects to cooperateC. Create a partnership agreement for cooperation with charitable organizationsWe will be glad to hear comments on the project, as well as answer your questions!Keep your crypto assets safe. dWill
